snippet: Yoenis Cespedes, the Mets’ slugging outfielder, left Game 4 of the N.L.C.S. with a sore left shoulder. The severity of the injury was unclean.
abstract: New York Mets center fielder Yoenis Cespedes exits Game 4 of National League Championship Series with shoulder soreness as team goes on to sweep Chicago Cubs to reach World Series.
lead_paragraph: Yoenis Cespedes, the Mets’ slugging outfielder, left Game 4 of the N.L.C.S. with a sore left shoulder. The severity of the injury was unclean.

headline.print_headline: Sore Shoulder Puts Cespedes Out of Game In 2nd Inning
headline.main: Sore Shoulder Puts Yoenis Cespedes Out of Game in 2nd Inning
